participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: determined and creative, with a touch of whimsy.
participant_1.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: curious and organized, with a passion for learning.
participant_2.background: i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.
